content: is there any  BEST CRYPTO EXCHANGE IN 2022

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: BinanceKrakenCoinbase ProThey’re the three most reputable ones in Western countries. They all have a long history of being trusted. Obviously don’t leave any substantial amount of crypto on an exchange for any long period of time though, that’s just asking for trouble. Make sure you self custody.
